title: Implement heuristic student grader integration
Phase C: finalize CodeAct tools + TA enforcement
description: Implement the remaining DSPy CodeAct infrastructure called out in docs/PLAN.md Phase C: finish DuckDB-backed data tool implementations, add world-model write helpers (wm_link, outline persistence, timeline updates), and enforce TA-specific tool whitelists when running CodeAct programs so each role is sandboxed.
notes: Reservations cleared; implementing DuckDB helper + world-model mutations + TA whitelist enforcement per history/2025-11-12-chartreusecastle-0ky-plan.md

title: Expose highlight source in manifests + portal
description: Now that the orchestrator emits dataset-only highlights when the world model is ablated, we should record whether highlights came from the world model vs dataset and surface that info via CLI + portal (trace labels, headings, API). Keeps auditors from misinterpreting ablation results.

title: Document new wm-inspect commands in tooling guide
Document new wm-inspect commands and notebook slug env
Implement eval_loop CLI using StudentGrader
Docs should reference outputs/world_model/state.sqlite
description: README, docs/ARCHITECTURE.md, and WORLD_MODEL_TOOLING.md still instruct contributors to write directly to world_model/state.sqlite in repo root, but the pipeline now keeps the SQLite store under outputs/world_model/state.sqlite. Update the docs + script help to point at the outputs path so ingestion commands don't leave stray files in the repo root.

title: Document per-bead commit cadence in AGENTS.md
Hide notebook preflight entries from portal exports
description: NotebookPublisher stores a preflight record (kind=preflight) ahead of real exports, but the portal API/UI surfaces it as a normal section. Filter preflight entries server-side and in the frontend so only real sections appear, and update portal tests to cover this.

title: PLAN Phase A should reference vendor paths
description: Phase A still shows 'external/rlm' and 'external/open-notebook' even though the repo now uses vendor/rlm and vendor/open-notebook. Update the instructions + commands so new contributors run the right git submodule steps.

title: Ensure student mutation loop respects per-rubric failures
description: StudentLoopRunner currently decides to stop mutations when the overall score exceeds the rubric threshold, even if individual rubrics (e.g., grounding) are still failing. Because satisfied_checks uses the aggregate score, the loop can exit with rubric_failures populated and no mutation applied. Update _should_continue to require every rubric to pass (or at least no failing entries) before counting the rubric check as satisfied, and add regression coverage so future changes keep this invariant.

title: Fix query_world_model default path
description: scripts/query_world_model.py defaults to outputs/world_model/state.sqlite but ingest writes world_model/state.sqlite at repo root. Running CLI without --store fails. Update default to match ingest path and add test.

Mention COURSEGEN_VENDOR_RLM_PATH in PLAN
Portal should return relative notebook export paths

Persist notebook export stubs
Portal: surface teacher trace artifacts
Scaffold CourseGen orchestrator directories
Implement DuckDB-backed run_sql_query tool for CodeAct
Implement DuckDB-backed run_sql_query tool
Update course constraints sample to match schema
description: apps/orchestrator/run_poc.py defaults to config/course_config.yaml, but that YAML still uses the old course_name/audience_prereqs keys. load_course_constraints now expects CourseConstraints with title/duration_weeks/audience/etc, so the CLI immediately exits with 'Invalid course constraints'. Bring the sample in sync with CourseConstraints and add regression coverage so future schema tweaks keep the defaults working.

title: Fix vendor submodules (rlm vs open-notebook)
description: Swap the vendor/rlm and vendor/open-notebook directories so each points to the correct upstream repo, ensure .gitmodules entries match, and document validation steps.

title: Print highlight artifact path after CLI run

Portal should expose notebook export id
description: Open Notebook API responses include "id" for created sections, but the portal only reads note_id/section_id. Update _parse_notebook_exports to fall back to response['id'] so UI shows actual note IDs.

title: Ignore Next.js build artifacts
description: Add frontend/.next and frontend/node_modules to .gitignore so dev builds don't litter git status.

title: Ablations properly skip WM/students/recursion
description: When the CLI passes ablations (no_world_model, no_students, no_recursion) the orchestrator still builds WM highlights, tries to run CodeAct programs, and attempts notebook exports. Implement guards in TeacherOrchestrator + CLI summaries so each flag cleanly disables its subsystem, and add regression tests covering each toggle.
notes: FuchsiaPond picking up ablation guard fixes

title: CLI tests should assert outputs/world_model path
description: tests/test_cli_run_poc.py still references world_model/state.sqlite in repo root, even though the default config and docs now use outputs/world_model/state.sqlite. Update the tests to use the outputs path so new contributors copying commands from assertions don’t get conflicting guidance.

Clean up the component: remove duplicate declarations, dedupe/rename sections, and ensure failing_* arrays default safely.
